entry.title: dotnet/announcements - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-28
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2023-33170: .NET Security Feature Bypass Vulnerability #264

entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • NativeAOT publishing with MSBuild doesn't work with .NET 8 SDK #89659
  • ETW need a mechanism to get an activity_id #89657
    9.0.0
  • Consider a better implementation for ep_rt_aot_thread_get_id #89650
    9.0.0
  • ETW::GCLog::ForceGCForDiagnostics uses AttachCurrentThread #89649
  • [API Proposal]: Create vectors of lower dimension from vectors of higher dimension #89647
  • StreamWriter keeps working after being disposed if `leaveOpen: true` is used #89646
    Future
  • [Crossgen2] Stack overflow in Crossgen2 compilation of the test src/tests/Loader/classloader/generics/regressions/DD117522/Test.csproj #89645
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Future of Numerics and AI - Provide a downlevel `System.Numerics.Tensor` class #89639
  • [browser][perf] Blazor startup regression #89631
    8.0.0
  • Improve cleanup of EventPipe/DiagnosticServer resources during shutdown. #89629
    9.0.0
  • [mono/wasm] regression in IndexOfAnyAsciiSearcher #89624
    8.0.0
  • EventPipe shutdown race condition in .net7/.net6 #89621
  • superpmi-collect fails with "module 'asyncio' has no attribute 'get_running_loop'" #89618
  • ICorProfiler ELT hooks need tested with UnmanagedCallersOnly methods #89617
    8.0.0
  • [mono] Merge LLVM and non-LLVM code paths in emit_vector_2_3_4 #89616
    Future
  • [mono] Issues with handling nested generic structures during generic sharing #89613
    9.0.0

Closed

  • Tag thread specific information to events #88790
    8.0.0
  • _NoLogging methods in VM #89634
    Future
  • [JIT] Splitting `instrDesc` for EVEX encoded instruction #87016
    8.0.0
  • JsonConverter.Read call inside another converter throws InvalidOperationException: Cannot skip tokens on partial JSON. #74108
    8.0.0
  • Polymorphic deserialization of a composite collection throws NullReferenceException #85934
    8.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Memory.Span<Byte> #81227
    8.0.0
  • 6 Regressions in System.MathBenchmarks.(Min/Max) #88482
    8.0.0
  • Add a counter for gen0 budget #74217
    8.0.0
  • Add opmask (k) registers to the register allocator #80823
    9.0.0
  • Injected or scoped ServiceProvider does not support Keyed services #89447
  • Native AOT cross-build for iOS cannot find 'libproc.h' file #89625
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Java-like throws keyword in method signature #89622
  • [mono][ios] MarshalingPInvokeScanner fails with PE image does not have metadata #89429
    8.0.0
  • [mono] The bitcast test fails with exit code 104 on apple mobile platforms #89385
    8.0.0
  • [Mono] Intrinsify System.Numerics.Vector4 API's with mini JIT on Arm64 #86957
    8.0.0
  • [Mono][Android] App crashes with InvalidProgramException #78833
    8.0.0
  • HttpWebRequest.MaximumResponseHeadersLength Property doesn't support -1 contrary to the docs #88524
    Future
  • API documentation debt - Microsoft.Extensions.Caching #43868
  • [wasm][debugger] Firefox test failure `DebuggerTests.MiscTests.InspectPropertiesOfObjectFromExternalLibrary` #89602
    8.0.0
  • Wrong line numbers in exception stack trace on macOS/arm64 #81526
    8.0.0
  • Analyzer: Report inefficient use of sets. #85490
    8.0.0
  • Enable RIP-relative addressing for JIT access to class statics on x64 non-windows #8545
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix Globalization Invariant string comparisons with ordinal ignore casing #89660
    area-System.Globalization, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] CI: Don't run chrome debugger tests on runtime-wasm if they #89658
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Rename UnrollEqualsStartsWIth to UnrollEqualsStartsWith #89656
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use latest ILC to AOT-compile ILC #89655
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • SPMI: Gracefully handle recorded EE-side exceptions during replay #89654
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove some manual test scaffolding #89653
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable new analyzer CA1868: 'Unnecessary call to 'Contains' for sets' and fix findings #89652
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Build native windows-arm64 Mono cross-compilers #89651
    area-Build-mono
  • [Draft] Re-enabling eventlog tests to verify behavior #89644
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.Diagnostics.EventLog
  • Use new name of the ignorelist switch. #89643
    area-Infrastructure
  • [Mono]: Fix Windows static build to not export MONO_API symbols. #89642
    area-Build-mono
  • Add file-scoped class trimming test #89640
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [NativeAOT] Properly implement `System.Linq.Expressions` substitutions according to the recent refactoring #89638
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Implement MVP part of const generics for CoreCLR #89636
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [ARM64] Use SHRN in SpanHelpers.CountValueType #89632
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • Add more verifications in EventPipe rundownvalidation test. #89623
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, area-Diagnostics-mono
  • [release/7.0] Update ds-ipc-pal-namedpipe to fix shutdown race #89620
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Update ds-ipc-pal-namedpipe to fix shutdown race #89619
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Add JsonContent.Create overloads which accept JsonTypeInfo #89614
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [wasm] CI: Add support for running WBT with multithreaded runtime installed too #89611
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Fix host debug view not showing services before start #89610
    area-Extensions-Hosting

Merged

  • Tag events with thread specific information #89516
    8.0.0
  • Remove _NoLogging methods from VM #89641
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • SPMI: Do not consider BADCODE as a replay failure #89626
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser] dispose more JS proxies #89559
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • [Mono] Fix build failure on main: remove unused var #89648
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Add some checks for merged test groups #89521
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][tests] Add prefix load environment variable for correct assembly path resolution #89572
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • Ensure built-in converters can skip JSON values when invoked via custom converters in async deserialization. #89637
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Fix collection deserialization in polymorphic objects. #89635
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • [mono][sgen] Log also size of reserved empty major blocks #88825
    area-GC-mono
  • Gen0 Budget counter #89412
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Implement IKeyedServiceProvider interface on ServiceProviderEngineScope #89509
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • Re-enable event tracing feature on NativeAOT/iOS and fix PalCreateDump.cpp build #89627
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Don't include empty prefix with EnvironmentVariablesConfigurationProvider #89612
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • [mono][interp] Add implicit conversion of floating-point call args #89428
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, 8.0.0
  • [mono][jit] Enabled Ctor, Set_Item and Get_Item Vector4 intrinsics for miniJIT on ARM64 #89501
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 8.0.0
  • [mono] Fix second pass of MarshallingPInvokeScanner with metadata-free DLLs #89555
    area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • [mono][android] Always include marshal-ilgen #89564
    os-android, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Make a copy of 'clrjit' binary for use in SuperPMI collect to avoid heap errors when the same 'clrjit' binary is used #89473
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix ProfileEnter / ProfileLeave #88134
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Fix issue with being able to MakeGenericMethod methods on generic types #89615
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Enable TLS field access optimization #89561
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • adding clrgc variant with regions enabled #89129
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Remove extraneous quotation marks and other doc fixes #89528
    needs-area-label
  • Add more doc comments that were missing #89597
    documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 8.0.0
  • NativeAOT createdump fork/exec for crash dump generation #89203
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix test failing on firefox #89607
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Fix arm64 line numbers in stacktraces #89604
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0

Updated

  • [Corrected] - Enable Libraries R2R Testing in CI #89405
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 8.0.0
  • [Perf] Cache key size in CngKey #89599
    area-System.Security, tenet-performance
  • [browser] Integrate DevServer into WasmAppHost #88985
    arch-wasm, area-Host, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • [browser] Read `AssetTraitValue` to get culture for resource during webcil transformation #89600
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • Flow binder gen diag locations correctly & pick up more bind input patterns #89537
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Don't use addressing modes for volatile loads for gc types #70794
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser] Clean-up typescript code imported from Blazor #89435
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2231640 #89414
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Update Workflow instruction for codespace #89368
    documentation, area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Inconsistent DebuggerDisplay formatting - Fix space, equal for name/value and Indirect Value #89370
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Crossgen2 support for static virtual method resolution (take 2) #87438
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Remove unnecessary "return 100"s from tests #89550
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use live illink for trimming tests #88929
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Remove Crossgen2's -O option in Test Builds Wherever Possible #89223
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Add Info warning for int return values #89601
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [nodejs][http] remove active issue 86326 #89588
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net.Http, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • Add check that tests are public #89554
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Crossplatform ResourceUpdater #89303
    area-HostModel, community-contribution
  • Upgrade DNNE to build incrementally #89594
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Try to fix missing libc++.so.1 errors in arm64 llvmaot perf run #88705
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Stop using computed RID for RUNTIME_IDENTIFIER property #89598
    breaking-change, area-Host, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • [mono][tests] Enable ILStrip during AOT compilation of library tests #88167
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • [ios][tests] Run functional tests with Mono and Native AOT on Helix #87773
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • [nativeaot][ios] Improve Native AOT test coverage on apple mobile platforms #89301
    os-ios, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Add BinaryData.ContentType #87744
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Add MediaType to BinaryData #89605
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Added IAsyncDisposable to TextReader #89477
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Add top level statement trimming tests #89606
    area-Tools-ILLink
  • [NativeAOT] Inline TLS access for windows/x64 #89472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix Vector512 rightshift #89339
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Fix ABI and Interop issues with InlineArray types #89519
    area-Interop-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Remove _isBlocked constraint from StreamReader.Peek() #89609
    area-System.IO
  • Create docs transport package and turn on extensions source of truth #89312
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [OSX] HybridGlobalization Implement missing cases for GlobalizationNative_GetLocaleInfoString #89296
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios, os-tvos, os-maccatalyst
  • Port NativeAOT exception handling to CoreCLR #88034
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Add [DebuggerGuidedStepThrough] to new invoker methods #89596
    area-System.Reflection, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [HttpClientFactory] Remove dependency on ILoggerFactory #89531
    area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory
  • [browser] high level documentation of WASM features #89469
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • [mono] Fix more memory leaks in aot+interp mode. #89580
    needs-area-label, 8.0.0
  • Enable use-after-return checking in ASAN #89204
    area-Infrastructure
  • Bugfix/30024 problem with concurrency type descriptor getconverter #85156
    area-System.ComponentModel, community-contribution
  • Upgrade all VMs to AMD64 Ubuntu 22.04 #86194
    area-Infrastructure
  • Fix EventLog test CanReadAndWriteMessages #89586
    area-System.Diagnostics.EventLog
  • Add SearchValues<string> #88394
    area-System.Buffers, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • add SendTo/ReceiveFrom with SocketAddress #88970
    area-System.Net.Sockets, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fix a bunch of DWARF errors #89488
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ASP.NET CI Broken on Linux ARM #34316

PullRequests

Created

  • Workaround issue with explicitly implemented indexers #34318
    untriaged, Area-GenAPI
  • Remove tooltask validation for Entrypoint/EntrypointArgs #34311
    Area-Containers

Updated

  • Tool install global command: Download tool packages from nuget when installing global tools #33835
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • [Containers] validate that the normalized repository name is a meaningful name #34286
    Area-Containers
  • Parse User and Port Container Metadata from special environment variables #34154
    Area-Containers
  • [wasm] Remove `UsingMicrosoftNETSdkBlazorWebAssembly` from Wasm SDK #34166
    untriaged, Area-WasmSdk
  • One option for fixing the locked file issue in the test #34307
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Enable "portable" RID graph when targeting .NET 8 and higher #34279
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-28
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Proposal: Semi-Auto-Properties; `field` keyword #140
    Working Set
  • [Proposal]: String/Character escape sequence `\e` as a short-hand for `\u001b` (`<ESCAPE>`) #7400
  • Champion "readonly for locals and parameters" #188
    Backlog

PullRequests

Updated

  • Create proposal for "method group improvements" #7399
  • Create spec for lambda params with by-ref modifiers without type name #7369

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Calling SyntaxGenerator.Declaration on an explicit interface indexer implementation generates the wrong result #69284
  • Collection expression target-type not being used for nested spread expressions. #69277
    17.8
  • Find all references on generated file yields no results #69270
  • File rename that changes case crashes a NavBar and Semantic Classification #69269

Closed

  • File-local type doesn't "shadow" namespaces #68429
    17.8
  • LSIF indexing performance degraded #68750
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-33928.125 #69281
  • Possible null reference assignment should be ignored when destructuring with a discard #69263
    17.8
  • Scoped keyword emitted by SyntaxGenerator for out parameters #69213
  • ref struct: uninitialized ref field and no way to initialize it. #69151

PullRequests

Created

  • SyntaxGenerator handle explicit interface indexer #69285
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Fix auto-default behavior when value-assigning a ref field #69283
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Update rule ID for 'Unnecessary call to Set.Contains' #69282
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • WIP: not ready for review. #69280
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add analyzer/fixer to update expressions like `Array.Empty<T>()` over to using the `[]` collection expression. #69279
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Preserve formatting when converting array-expressions to collection-expressions. #69278
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Also downgrade corehost to normal queue to avoid issues in new VS version #69275
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Implement by-ref lambda params without type name #69273
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Check fo both csharp and visualbasic in IsCSharpOrVisualBasicSuperSet #69271
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Implement LSP debug test commands #69267
    Area-IDE, LSP, untriaged

Merged

  • Allow File-local type to shadow a namespace declaration in a different file #69254
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Reuse the workspace to better take advantage of caches when indexing #69268
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Update "use collection initializer" to use a collection-expression if the user prefers that form. #69219
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Update PublishData.json after M2 snap #69276
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Remove hardcoded value in tagger #69274
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Improve and clarify the logic when speculatively comparing old/new code to ensure semantics are the same. #69261
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Only use scoped for ref parameters #69220
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Add more `ref readonly` tests and address comments #69183
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters, Next
  • Fix `ref readonly` mismatch retargeting #69205
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters, Next

Updated

  • Honor Concord's TruncatedString flag to reduce memory usage #68969
    Area-Interactive, Community, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: use inline array for ReadOnlySpan<T> argument to builder method #69227
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Update Versions.props for 17.8 P2 #69260
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • F1 help for `#if` and `#else` refers to preprocessor symbols, not `if_CSharpKeyword` and `else_CSharpkeyword` #69192
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Only Left and returnValue gets checked for dynamic in signature #69214
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, 17.8
  • Cache extension methods on binder #69172
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Backlog
  • Cache SubstitutedNamedTypeSymbol.GetMembers to avoid unnecessary allocations #69164
    Area-Compilers, Community, 17.8
  • Remove newly doc'd rules #69259
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • Check both csc.exe and vbc.exe as filename to exclude #69221
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • Workaround vsix deployment issue in local build #69266
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Use TimeProvider in M.E.Diagnostics.HealthChecks #49715
  • BlazorWasm benchmark failing #49713
  • ConfigurationBuilder binding fails when using JsonPropertyName to decorate a property #49711
  • Prolonged Application Pool shut down in case of kept-alive connections #49708
  • Embedding views no longer works with preview 6 #49705
  • A11y_.NETCore_ASP.NETCore_About_Reflow: At reflow resolution "About" link is not visible in the page. #49703
  • A11y_.NETCore_ASP.NETCore_About_Zoom: At 200% zoom "About" link is not visible in the page. #49702
  • Add a method to efficiently bulk create users in ASP.NET Identity. #49701
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudDeleteProduct #49699
  • Perf regression: json #49698

Closed

  • Introduce per-HealthCheck Delay and Period #42645
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Stack Overflow when using some EndpointFilterInvocationContext properties #49284
  • Perf improvement: single_query #49671
  • Perf regression: connectionclose, mapaction, plaintext #49672
  • Perf regression: connectionclose #49673
  • Perf improvement: json #49697
  • IEmailSender exists in both 'Microsoft.AspNetCore.Identity.UI' and 'Microsoft.Extensions.Identity.Core' #49681
  • How are hub options configured in a Blazor Web App? #49710
  • Cleanup duplicate code in src/ProjectTemplates/test/Templates.Tests/BaselineTest.cs #49647
    8.0-rc1
  • Update API docs for OnAfterRender to clarify it is only invoked after an interactive render and isn't called during prerendering #49518
    8.0-rc1
  • [dotnet-sdk-8.0.100-preview.7.23375.2] The requested service 'Microsoft.Extensions.Options.IStartupValidator' has not been registered error shows when trying to resolve dependency in application forum. #49675
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_ef #49688

PullRequests

Created

  • Update DictionaryJumpTable.cs with FrozenDictionary #49714
    area-runtime
  • [Blazor] Support configuring hub options #49712
    area-blazor
  • Remove standard words #49700
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Improve ANCM file watcher thread management #49696
    feature-iis, area-networking

Merged

  • Introduce per-HealthCheckRegistration parameters #42646
    area-healthchecks, community-contribution, 8.0-rc1
  • Reenable CA1305 warnings #49695
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-rc1
  • Reverting SDK #49709
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-rc1
  • Remove stack overflow in EndpointFilterInvocationContexts #49285
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 8.0-rc1
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `1ed6a8c` to `40412d8` #49706
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-rc1
  • Remove duplicate checks on path in test #49648
    area-mvc, community-contribution, 8.0-rc1
  • Clarify API docs for OnAfterRender #49519
    area-blazor, 8.0-rc1
  • Update _LoginPartial.Identity.cshtml with correct returnUrl #49553
    pending-ci-rerun, area-ui-rendering, 8.0-rc1
  • Fix MinimalFormSample location in sln #49692
    8.0-rc1
  • Update EndpointDataSource.cs #49674
    area-runtime, 8.0-rc1
  • Fix typo ans -> and #49694
    area-identity, community-contribution, 8.0-rc1

Updated

  • Fix BindAsync and misc bugs in RDG #49693
    feature-rdg, area-minimal
  • fix: Account for form attribute on checkbox tag input helper #49201 #49323
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2231483 #49575
    area-mvc
  • [Blazor] SSR unified routing #49622
    area-blazor
  • [Blazor] Fix flaky tests CanCacheRouteTable #49680
    area-blazor
  • Make DataProtectionKey props virtual #49604
    area-dataprotection, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-28
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • finalizequeue can exit with exit code 139 #3917
    8.0.0

Updated

  • ClrMd v2 cannot find emitted type #4108

PullRequests

Updated

  • Add Support For Multiplexing `System.Diagnostics.Metrics` for `Dotnet Monitor` and `Dotnet Counters` #3889

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Cannot find `ShellHandler` under `Microsoft.Maui.Handlers` #16424
  • Unable to launch app on iOS from both VS and VS MAC #16421
  • Android app crashes with an ANR on .NET 8 preview 6 #16418
  • ScrollView with Orientation=Both does not have correct values in ScrollX and ScrollY properties #16417
  • [MAUI]The Horizontal Scrolling does not work on MacCatalyst target. #16416
  • when I release an APP, it can't display binding data properly, but it will display properly when I run it in debug mode. #16414

Closed

  • Clipping an Image with a Border has a gap on Windows #9129
    .NET 8 GA
  • Embedding .NET MAUI in a native WinUI 3 App doesn't work as expected - Not even launching #11516
    Backlog
  • Merging ResourceDictionary from referenced assembly fails to compile #4398
    Backlog
  • A11y_.NET Core_Recipes App My Recipes New_New Recipe_NonTextContrast: Disabled "Save" button is not looking like disabled. #15740
    .NET 8 GA
  • A11y_.NET Core_Recipes App My Recipes New_New Recipe_New Recipe_Labels or Instructions: In "New Recipe" screen required fields are not marked up with any chevron/symbols. #15743
    .NET 8 GA
  • A11y_.NET Core_Recipes App My Recipes New_New Recipe_Screen reader: After changing the value for review, Screen reader is not announcing new value its announcing incorrect rating value. #15741
    .NET 8 GA

PullRequests

Created

  • [ci] Run Codesign Verification after MSI creation #16423
  • [ci] Sign unsigned .net 8 preview 7 files #16422

Merged

  • [Windows] Fix Border corners clipping issue #14403
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, area/controls 🎮, control-border, .NET 8 GA
  • [release/8.0.1xx-preview7] [C] fix SelectedIndex propagation for picker #16412
  • [net8.0] Merge main to net8.0 #16420
    t/housekeeping ♻︎

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Entity Framework Core : seed data error using OwnsOne #31373
  • Conversion of int[] array with array.Contains(int value) causes Exception|Microsoft.Data.SqlClient.SqlException (0x80131904): Incorrect syntax near '$'. #31371
  • When i compile models, in xxxxxCompliedModelBuilder.cs show "CS0204 Only 65534 locals are allowed" #31370

Closed

  • When i compile models, in xxxxxCompliedModelBuilder.cs show "CS0204 Only 65534 locals are allowed" #31368

PullRequests

Created

  • Obsolete CoreTypeMapping.ValueGeneratorFactory #31372
  • Json full query support well almost #31369

Merged

  • Add NativeAOT support to the compiled relational model #31333

Updated

  • Bump Grpc.AspNetCore from 2.45.0 to 2.55.0 #31296
    blocked, area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Metadata for primitive collection mapping #31351
